p.span: "The Mission of the Sunapee School District is to prepare students to be life-long learners and contributing members of society by maintaining a challenging educational program in a safe environment.”

div.div: [UPDATED DAILY] Whaddya Got Sunapee students and staff?? The Sunapee Police Department has donated 500 hacky sacs to the Sunapee School district.

a.title: Town Employees take on the Hacky Sack Challenge

div.a: Town Employees take on the Hacky Sack Challenge
div.div: Employees from multiple town departments take on the hacky sack challenge and play all across the town.

We hope that you are all doing well in our new living and learning environment. Thank you all very much for completing our parent survey; the information you provided will be very helpful as we continue to provide remote learning for your children.

span.style: font-size: 35px; letter-spacing: 3px; text-align: center; text-transform: uppercase; font-family: asapbold;
